name: PowerCenter:Avoid mapping with a very low comments/objects ratio
description:
Mapping should have at least a ratio [Commented objects@/[Total objects] greater than X %.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Mappings and Mapplets with commented objects/total objects ratio lower than X %
It provides the following information: 
Mapping or Mapplet full name, Percentage of number of commented objects by the total number of objects in Mapping
rationale: For understandability and maintainability, objects (source, transformations, target) withing a Mapping should be documented.
remediation: Enrich field Description with comments in objects.
total: Total number of Mappings and Mapplets
